# isSessionTargetAMac()

**Instance Method**

Tells whether the target device is a Mac by checking its service record.

## Declaration

```swift
func isSessionTargetAMac() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

TRUE only if device service record has Mac entry, FALSE for all else.

## Discussion

Tells whether the target device is a Mac by checking its service record.
title: isSessionTargetAMac()
